content.raw:
When I compare the pattern on your floor with the one in my world it seems like your wall is closer to the table than in my world, so you might either be running some older version or it got moved.

@kennysharma suggested for you to clear out your .gazebo/models dir as this happened to him as well the first time he upgraded to 2.6.1 and clearing seemed to fix it (maybe the wall thickness got decreased at some point?).
content.html:
When I compare the pattern on your floor with the one in my world it seems like your wall is closer to the table than in my world, so you might either be running some older version or it got moved.

@kennysharma suggested for you to clear out your .gazebo/models dir as this happened to him as well the first time he upgraded to 2.6.1 and clearing seemed to fix it (maybe the wall thickness got decreased at some point?).
